name: The Mail Never Stops
description:
The Mail Never Stops it just keeps coming and coming!

Your job is simple: sort the mail. Start as a temp, learn the job fast and try to get promoted.

Controls:
  • Sort Mail: A (Left) / D(Right)
  • Drink Coffee: - Spacebar
  • Pause - P

Code & stuff: @DevFrmNothaPlce

Assets credits:
  • @Kicked-in-Teeth
